title: Live updates: Israel says Hamas top military commander killed; Hamas political leader mourned in Iran
content: Mohammed Deif, the leader of Hamas’s armed wing, was killed in Gaza in July, the IDF said. Hamas political leader Ismail Haniyeh was assassinated in Iran.
summary: Mohammed Deif, the leader of Hamas’s armed wing, was killed in Gaza in July, the IDF said. Hamas political leader Ismail Haniyeh was assassinated in Iran.

title: Hamas leader Ismail Haniyeh assassinated; Netanyahu says Israel dealt ‘crushing blows’ to Iran-backed groups
content: Ismail Haniyeh led Hamas, the Palestinian group that runs Gaza, for over a decade. Hamas said he was killed in Tehran after attending the inauguration of Iran’s president.
summary: Ismail Haniyeh led Hamas, the Palestinian group that runs Gaza, for over a decade. Hamas said he was killed in Tehran after attending the inauguration of Iran’s president.

title: How false claims about a mass stabbing led to a riot in the U.K.

content: Haniyeh was under U.S. sanctions and wanted by the International Criminal Court. The political leader was the public face of Hamas.
